itemDescription: British Tory politician, Governor-General of India (1790-1871)

wikipedia_page.main: Edward Law, 1st Earl of Ellenborough,  (8 September 1790 – 22 December 1871) was a British Tory politician. He was four times President of the Board of Control and also served as Governor-General of India between 1842 and 1844.

response: #Octavia (1792–1819), married Edward Law, 1st Earl of Ellenborough
*Edward Law, 1st Earl of Ellenborough (8 September 1790 – 22 December 1871)
